Event_CommandName.label: Command for showing the time till your event
Event_CommandName.tooltip: The command for showing the time till your event

Event_CommandIsGlobalCooldown.label: Global cooldown
Event_CommandIsGlobalCooldown.tooltip: This shows if the command gets global cooldown

Event_CommandUsage.label: The usage of this command
Event_CommandUsage.tooltip: This is shown when fetching help for this command

Event_CommandDescription.value: Shows the time until a given event
Event_CommandDescription.label: Description

Event_Start.label: Start date of the event (dd-mm-yyyy:hh-mm)
Event_Start.tooltip: Insert the start date of the event

Event_End.label: End date of the event (dd-mm-yyyy:hh-mm)
Event_End.tooltip: Insert the end date of the event

Event_DaysRemainingResponse.value: There are still $days days until event
Event_DaysRemainingResponse.label: Response if the event starts after today (available tags: $days)
Event_DaysRemainingResponse.tooltip: The response when the event has not started yet

Event_StartsTodayResponse.label: Response if the event starts today
Event_StartsTodayResponse.tooltip: The response when the event starts today

Event_CurrentResponse.label: Response if the event is running
Event_CurrentResponse.tooltip: The response when the event has started

Event_OverResponse.label: Response if the event is over
Event_OverResponse.tooltip: The response when the event is over
